page.title: 06A WEEK IN OUR SCHOOL (CONT)
page.content: When we get home we usually watch T.V. or go out to play.Most of us have tea at about 6.00pm and go to bed about 8.30pm or 9.00pm. The clubs we go to at home are brownies, cubs and athletics club. In cubs and brownies we play a lot of games like starboard_we pretend we are on a ship and Akela/Brown Owl shouts out instructions. Stoneage football_a cross between soccer and rugby;there are no rules!! Queens got a headache the queen and king sit blindfolded at the top of the room.Someone has to steal the treasure from under their chair.If the queen hears someone coming she nudges the king who says " queens got a headache" and that person is out. These are some of the things we do during an ordinary week.
